thread.title: UPDATE: Police tracking two vehicles after fatal A343 crash
thread.title_full: UPDATE: Police tracking two vehicles after fatal A343 crash

title: UPDATE: Police tracking two vehicles after fatal A343 crash
text:
0 comments 
OFFICERS investigating a fatal crash on the A343 in Hampshire are trying to trace two specific vehicles. 
Police believe the drivers of a red S-reg Nissan Primera and a seven-and-a-half tonne truck may be key witnesses to the crash and could help with the investigation. 
A spokesman said: "If it was you or you know who it was please call us on 101 quoting Operation Climb - your information could really help us out. Thank you." 
The incident occured on the A343 near Abbotts Ann at around 5.30am on Friday when a grey Renault Laguna collided with a heavy goods vehicle. Share article 
The driver of the Renault, a man aged in his 40s, was pronounced dead at the scene. The driver of the HGV was unhurt.
